explanation: [0-0] On a grey surface, a hand holds a card with a blue card vaguely visible behind it.

[0-3] Then, another hand places a blue card on the grey surface. The scene cuts to some red liquid being poured into a round container. The scene changes again, showing a woman in protective clothing carrying yellow equipment, with two bottles of red liquid placed in front of her. The scene switches again to a hand wearing a blue glove pressing down on neatly arranged blue cards with red paint on the cover. Then the scene cuts to a hand wearing a blue glove waving a brush covered in red paint in the air.
